name: Hyundai Creta N Line
description: The price of Hyundai Creta N Line , a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 16.82  - 20.45 Lakh. It is available in 12 variants, with an engine of 1482 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Creta N Line comes with 6 airbags. Hyundai Creta N Line  is available in 6 colours.
